Text:
Taught by Sean Carroll
California Institute of Technology
Ph.D., Harvard University

Thank you for uploading this and the other TTC videos!

I just wanted to point out that the end of most of the episodes in this get cut off a little bit before the end. It hasn't cut off anything important so far though. Hopefully if you didn't know about this problem (probably a result of some part of the ripping process), you can see if there's a way to fix it for future TTC releases.

Aye, end get cut off for me to, so not an invididual issue.

Otherwise, great lecture from a great lecturer.

Yeah, guys! I found the same error too, it happens in some number of lectures, but surely our great friend dohduhdah have nothing to do with this! He's just sharing stuff from elsewhere! And thanks also to who did the rip, because there is an example of such an amazing course! I also found in other sites that professor Sean Carroll is atheist. So nice! In my native language I can't find this kind of content, more less with evolutionary and related viewpoints.
